description: phi(n) is equal to the sum of the prime-power components of n-1.
comments: Close to Fermat primes (A019434). Next term if it exists is greater than 10^8. - _Jud McCranie_, Dec 09 1999Next term > 10^9. - _Michel Marcus_, Jun 03 2014
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = (f = factor(n-1)) && (sum(i=1, #f~, f[i,1]^f[i,2]) == eulerphi(n)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 03 2014
